entry.title: Lord of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: GabrielRamos

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,697Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: No one knows where he came from. Only that he survived something that would have destroyed anyone else. Gotham was his forge, but the world is his battlefield. There are secrets that will never be revealed—and a power no one dares name. In the end, there will be no heroes, villains, or gods: only him, and all the others below.

entry.title: Tell a difference
entry.summary:
Author: Ella_Katz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,924Chapters: 7/19Kudos: 133

Summary: During a battle with unidentified aliens, Bruce gets kidnapped and taken to another dimension with an evil Superman that is determined to make Bruce his lover. Bruce gets stuck with this other being for five months while the good Superman back home desperately tries to find a way to rescue his (possibly) unrequited love.

entry.title: Sawdust Eaters
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,998Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Adrien gets added to a family group chat and he's going to make it their problem.Things take a very interesting turn as this turns out to be no ordinary family. Dick is never going to be able to visit Paris. Tim might lose his mind. Jason is having a good time.A game of Cat & Mouse begins between Adrien and Tim. What was supposed to be a simple game of chase to spice up Adrien's depressing life, becomes a whirlwind romance between the two as they chase one another across Gotham.

entry.title: red velvet (hurtful, yet sweet)
entry.summary:
Author: cinderellion

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,551Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 192

Summary: "I hurt you again! I let another being cloud my mind, and I hurt you again-"Gloved hands with the sharpest of nails graze the aliens skin. Ice blue hues full of soft compassion that no one had ever seen in such a way."You could hurt me while under control a million times, and I would never love you any less."Or,The batkids are subjected to the sight of a mind controlled Superman essentially trying to murder their father.Low and behold, this wasn't the first time it's happened.

entry.title: And You, My Father, There on the Sad Height
entry.summary:
Author: notalegalist

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,165Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 289

Summary: Batman had long become resistant to Scarecrow’s Fear Toxin. Like he did with every villain he encountered, he had now had years of training combatting the vicious reagent, having developed multiple contingencies and mental tricks to escape its grasp. Yet, nothing had prepared him for a nearly imperceptible and slow-acting version of the drug.The Justice League begins to learn what the Dark Knight with no restraint looks like.

entry.title: Bruce Goes Batty
entry.summary:
Author: AtlasDaMoth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,587Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 488

Summary: In Bruce Wayne's opinion, as The Batman and Gotham's Billionaire, magic was both incredibly illogical, and quite stupid. Guns, swords, secret plots and evil schemes, he could deal with it all. Except for magic. Spells, curses, it was all unknown to him, and he hated it.He formed that idea on the subject at least a good three years ago. And now, as he stares at himself in the mirror, shaking hands gripping the long bat ears that had sprouted upon his head, he finds himself proven right yet again.Magic. Stupid, stupid magic.

entry.title: Operation: Chaos on the Runway
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,683Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 110

Summary: In an epic celebration for reaching 4 million subscribers on Cass and Steph's channel, the duo decides to host a livestream guaranteed to break the internet. Their grand plan? Revealing to the world that the mysterious dancer "C" is none other than Cassandra Cain Wayne.But this revelation barely scratches the surface of the night's most explosive moments. With every family member determined to help celebrate, the fun atmosphere quickly escalates into a wild dance competition - because when have the Waynes ever done anything without turning it into a rivalry?Secretly rehearsed choreographies, ruthless judges, and a side bet about their boyfriends' reaction times turn the night into an absolute spectacle. The Batfamily's legendary intensity meets chaotic fun in this unforgettable livestream event where every move could spark new memes and every reveal sends the fandom into meltdown.

entry.title: Knights' Song
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,180Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 400

Summary: Due to a magic-based mishap, Batman's internal dichotomy is upended into an external dynamic. The rest of the Batfam and Justice League can only watch on, both fascinated and disturbed.Or...Bruce Wayne has never had so much free time on his hands. He decides to spend it coaxing a grumpy Bat into letting himself be adopted sideways into brotherhood, meddling in his sons' lives, and messing with the Justice League. This works out better than anyone could have reasonably anticipated.

entry.title: A Peek Into The Past
entry.summary:
Author: Hoshi_no_koinu

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 421Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 32

Summary: A run-in with a magician leads to an awkward situation involving a younger Bruce and some buried secrets. New things come to light that may forever change the relationships and views everyone has of the old Bruce   aka my twist on the de-aged Bruce trope
